original_text: These are they that were numbered of the families of the sons of Gershon, of all that might do service in the tabernacle of the congregation, whom Moses and Aaron did number according to the commandment of the Lord.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와의 명령대로 회막에서 종사하는 게르손 자손의 모든 종족 중 계수된 자니라

sentences.original_text: These are they that were numbered
of the families of the sons of Gershon
of all that might do service
sentences.korean_translation: 섬길 수 있는 모든 자 중에서

sentences.original_text: in the tabernacle of the congregation
whom Moses and Aaron did number
according to the commandment of the Lord
